dict.string: dna it uses the camera in your mobile device to recognize images that can be snapped or scanned. The response could be anything from a simple web-link or video play or audio play or any other way of engagement!
If any image/news article displays the dna it Logo next to it, it implies that there is additional content available for viewing on your mobile device when you snap the image/news article.
How do I know what I can snap?

The App may not be able to sync with the server due to connectivity or network errors You may not have the latest, most optimized updated version of the application installed. Try some of the following corrective actions Focus on the correct image – check what exactly needs to be scanned (the whole ad, a logo, an element on the page or the whole page?) and ensure image fills the display window by using the two finger snap. If nothing happens, move camera off the image and back again. Ensure that there is no light reflecting off the image.
As of now dna it is available on Android and IOS. dna it shall be available on Blackberry and Windows 8 platforms soon.
On which devices does it work?

If the data connection is not strong enough, at times the download may be interrupted. If this happens follow the mentioned step: Go to the application settings. Clear the data for. Uninstall dna it. Reinstall and wait for the data to Sync. Use the app to see it functioning properly.
Why has the app stopped working after I updated?

There could be various reasons for it. For e.g. in a flight the application will not work due to the non-availability of network as the application requires on an active data connection. The same will happen during transit in any other means of transport where the network is not available.
Why does the application not work while traveling?
Yes! You will receive calls and SMS when using the application.
Will I receive calls and SMS when using the application?

snap2life is the software engine powering the dna it application. Snap2life® joins up print and billboard images with predefined online content. We offer the snap2life® Image Recognition and Augmented Reality in individually customized apps. For more information, please visit www.snap2life.com or contact us at dna@prismagl.com.
